nodes.text: Manka Squad was a squad of clone commandos who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. After the Separatist assault on the Republic capital planet Coruscant in 19 BBY, Manka Squad, together with fellow commando units Omega and Aquila, were tasked to assist the Coruscant Security Force in maintaining domestic security.
Manka Squad first appeared in the September 2008 novel Order 66, the fourth entry in the Republic Commando series by author Karen Traviss.
